ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors gratefully acknowledge the technical support of Allison Marotte, Olivier Bonnet, Delphine Etienne, Dansala Welba, and Alain Nyirimigabo. We are especially grateful to Suzanne, a traditional healer at Mamba/Huye, for her cooperation and to have availed the plant material. The study could not have been completed without the cooperation of the University of Rwandaâ€™s authorities, particularly the college of Science and Technology.
